Articles.Content: I'm using two of the Mk2-R radial parachutes on the tiny 1-man capsule, but even when they deploy I still come down at a screaming 32 m/s. Is this a bug?
A couple well-lit screen shots would be great. Is there anything attached to the pod, or is it just the capsule? Also, what body are you landing on?

Like the guy above me said, a photo would be great. Also, landinf on duna is different, it has an atmosphere but not that enough to lift your capsule, also are you landing the capsule itself or is it with other parts?
